name: OROBAZGU: THE MIRROR
description:
This game has been made for the CBJAM1, so please check out games from the other contestants as well if you liked it!
All of the game has been made by one guy in less than 5 days: music, textures, models, sound effects, code... If you want the source files, send me a little message on Discord!

LINK TO A SAMPLE OF THE CODE

———

Notes:
-There are two different endings
-You can unlock cheat codes by beating the game once
-The game has been inspired by Garage: Bad Dream Adventures and Petscop
-The Bolt community is hella cool
-This is my third game-jam, it's still a blast!
-The music is inspired by Yume Nikki

———

Welcome to Orobazgu.
